On Sun, 8 Sep 2002, dph_of_rules wrote:

> 1)I would compile and run it except for one big thing: I don't have
> the SDL.h file on my own computer.  Either that file didn't come with
> Microsoft Visual Studio, or somehow I overlooked it when installing
> Microsoft Visual Studio (unlikely, since I deliberately choose to
> install almost everything).

You shouldn't need SDL for pixedit. However, if you do need it, SDL
doesn't come with Visual Studio (SDL is open source, VS is, well,
Microsoft). You'll need to download the VS version of SDL from libsdl.org
and install them.

>
> scen150 and scen116 out of my set didn't.
>
> For most scenarios, it seems to work.
